[dev] Database
==============

**Convert uniqueOligo database to chr-files.**

usage: ``extract_database.py [-h] [--outdir od] db table``

+-------------------------------+
| Positional arguments          |
+=======+=======================+
| db    | Sqlite3 database path.|
+-------+-----------------------+   
| table | Table name.           |
+-------+-----------------------+   

+---------------------------------------+
| Optional arguments                    |
+=============+=========================+
| --outdir od | Database directory path.|
+-------------+-------------------------+
